item.title: English Vocabulary
item.description: This template helps you accelerate the process of creating flashcards for English vocabulary. You only need to enter the word you want to learn into the Vocab field, and the AI will automatically generate a flashcard with IPA, definition, and example sentence.
item.content:encoded:
This template helps you accelerate the process of creating flashcards for English vocabulary. You only need to enter the word you want to learn into the Vocab field, and the AI will automatically generate a flashcard with IPA, definition, and example sentence.

Note: By default, the definition is in English. If you want to change the language, open the template by clicking the "Cards" button in the deck editor, then modify the prompt section to ask the AI to provide the definition in your native language.

For words with multiple meanings, you should add a note in the "Extra" field to help the AI understand the correct context and create a flashcard for the right word.

Each word you enter will generate 2 flashcards:

  • One for recognition.
  • One for recall.

For the recall card, when you enter the correct word, the flashcard will automatically flip to the back. You can also press the "K" key to record your answer.

By default, AI-generated flashcards include: IPA, definition, and example sentence.
If you want to add extra information such as: collocations, word family, or synonyms/antonyms, you’ll need to set up quick responses. For more details on customizing the card template, refer to this guide.

item.title: 4000 Essential English Words
item.description: This deck is a enhanced version of the 4000 Essential English Words (all books) deck, now integrated with AI features powered by Langki.
item.content:encoded:
This deck is an enhanced version of the 4000 Essential English Words (all books) deck, now integrated with AI features powered by Langki.

To customize the deck, open the card template by clicking on "Cards" in the deck editor and modify the template according to your preferences. Read this to learn more details.

It is compatible with Anki Desktop, AnkiDroid, AnkiMobile, and AnkiWeb. However, to use the template properly on Anki Desktop, you’ll need to install the Langki add-on.

item.title: Multiple-choice questions for vocabulary practice
item.description: This template helps create multiple-choice questions for vocabulary practice.
item.content:encoded:
This template helps create multiple-choice questions for vocabulary practice. All options are generated by AI and are randomized with each review.

It is compatible with Anki Desktop, AnkiDroid, AnkiMobile, and AnkiWeb. However, to use the template properly on Anki Desktop, you’ll need to install the Langki add-on.

To customize the deck, open the card template by clicking on "Cards" in the deck editor and modify the template according to your preferences. Read this to learn more details.

Modify the template if you want to change the definition in the flashcard

Important: AI is only triggered to generate the flashcard when both the Front and Back fields are empty.

item.title: Prototype Template
item.description: This prototype template enables Anki users to integrate an AI chatbot into flashcards and extend the core functionality of Anki.
item.content:encoded:
This template is a prototype for Langki templates allowing Anki users to integrate AI chatbot into flashcards and extends the core features of Anki.

By default, it's configured for English learners, but you can clone or customize it to suit your needs.

To customize the deck, open the card template by clicking on "Cards" in the deck editor and modify the template according to your preferences. Read this to learn more details.

The template is compatible with Anki Desktop, AnkiDroid, AnkiMobile, and AnkiWeb. However, to use the template properly on Anki Desktop, you’ll need to install the Langki add-on.
